delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Channel.ActionEventHandler ( UserInfo  user,
string  channel,
string  description 
)

An action message was sent to a channel.

Parameters:
user The user who expresses the action.
channel The target channel.
description An action.
See also:
Listener.OnAction
delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Channel.ChannelListEventHandler ( string  channel,
ChannelMode  mode,
string  item,
UserInfo  who,
long  whenSet,
bool  last 
)

Response to a Sender.RequestChannelList command.

Parameters:
channel The channel name.
mode What type is this a list? For example bans, invitation masks, etc..
item A mask or nick (in the case of ChannelCreator).
last Is this the last item. If its the last then the item paramter will be empty unless the mode is ChannelCreator.
who Who set the mask (not for ChannelCreator).
whenSet When was it set (not for ChannelCreator).
See also:
Listener.OnChannelList

string  channel,
ChannelModeInfo[]  modes 
)

A channel's mode has changed.

Parameters:
who Who changed the mode.
channel The name of the channel.
modes Objects which hold all the information about 1 or more mode changes.
